doc:
Lane Smith https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lane_Smith 0 Walter Lane Smith III (April 29, 1936 – June 13, 2005) was an American actor. His well-known roles included portraying collaborator entrepreneur Nathan Bates in the NBC television series V, Mayor Bates in the film Red Dawn, newspaper editor Perry White in the ABC series Lois Clark: The New Adventures of Superman, Coach Jack Reilly in The Mighty Ducks, district attorney Jim Trotter III in My Cousin Vinny and American President Richard Nixon in The Final Days, for which he received a Golden Globe award nomination. Walter_Lane_Smith_III ( April_29_,_1936 – June_13_,_2005 ) was an_American_actor . His_well-known_roles included_portraying collaborator_entrepreneur_Nathan_Bates in the_NBC_television_series_V , Mayor_Bates in the_film_Red_Dawn , newspaper_editor_Perry_White in the_ABC_series_Lois_ : The_New_Adventures of Superman , Coach Jack_Reilly in The_Mighty_Ducks , district_attorney_Jim_Trotter_III in My_Cousin_Vinny and American_President_Richard_Nixon in The_Final_Days , for which he received a_Golden_Globe_award_nomination .
